Key Match Events: Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal for Croatia, then equalized for Albania in the 95th minute
Andrej Kramaric equalized for Croatia in the 74th minute
Qazim Laci scored the first goal for Albania in the 11th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Croatia’s Luka Modric and his teammates looked disappointed after the match
Albania’s coach Sylvinho said he was proud of his team’s performance
Kramaric said they should have won but conceded the last goal
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended in a 2-2 draw
Albania and Croatia are in a precarious situation in the group
The Volksparkstadion in Hamburg was split evenly between red-clad Albania fans and spectators in Croatia’s checkered shirt
